A uses his [[Hell Stab]] and swings with a horizontal chop at his opponent, unleashing a wave of electricity that sends them flying back.

== Trivia ==
* In the anime and manga, A performs a similar method with his Hell Stab, but unleashes a powerful gust of wind instead.
